mapper.select: select ta.ValueID as id, ta.V_ParentID as parent_id, ta.V_ValueNo as value_no, ta.V_Text as text, ta.V_Name as name, ta.V_F_Key as f_key, ta.V_ShowOrder as show_order, ta.V_Code as code, ta.V_Delete as delete_flag, ta.V_Remark as remark from sys_FieldValue ta

select ta.V_ParentID as parent_id, ta.V_ValueNo as value_no, ta.V_Text as text, ta.V_Name as name, ta.V_F_Key as f_key, ta.V_ShowOrder as show_order, ta.V_Delete as delete_flag, ta.V_Remark as remark from sys_FieldValue ta
